attributes.action: explain how the government can keep safe our personal details connected to proposed ID cards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government can not keep safe simple things like the Child Benefit data.
If the government get this wrong, how can they keep safe personal ID that cannot be changed if it is lost, such as fingerprints, iris scans and other personal data.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
